MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the G51 postcode area of Glasgow, affecting properties in Ardshiel Road and surrounding areas. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 10.54am. Our engineers have arrived on site at Ardshiel Road School substation and are investigating the cause of the fault. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 2pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11.36am on Thursday 25th February 2021
